tender.title: Framework Agreement for Installation and Repair
tender.description: Procure Plus Ltd (PP) is a social housing regeneration consortium based in the North West of England. PP specialises in the procurement of goods, works and services for the construction and maintenance of social housing properties. PP is a member of www.reallies.com . PP wishes to procure and enter into a framework agreement for the completion of a range of installation and repair works for planned maintenance predominantly in social housing properties but works may also be carried out in other public buildings including but not limited to schools and offices. The contractors will be expected to complete the works to a high standard and are expected to share PP's commitment to regeneration, specifically the creation of training and employment opportunities. Contractors will be required to interact with, and source certain materials from, the suppliers who are appointed to other Re:allies agreements (which are each subject to a separate procurement and contract notice).
